name: Lost Memories (russinsky)
description:
Controls:

WASD

V - Noclip

Right Click - Use

Very very early alpha survival game.

Performance is not the greatest currently.

But hopefully it'll get better in the future.

If you have ideas for the game come out with them and maybe i'll add some of them

If you want to close the game just Alt + F4 since there is no menu yet.
